short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide content of reddit for all but a whitelisted set of subreddits

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide all content across reddit except for a select list of subreddits you can specify. A simple way to remind yourself to avoid distracting subreddits without having to stop visiting productive subreddits.
